data.name: CreateDatabase
data.value:
USE [master] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Regions] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:26:08 PM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Regions]( [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Value] [int] NULL, [Name] [nchar](11) NOT NULL, [TimeStamp] [datetime] NOT NULL, [Description] [nchar](1024) NULL, [Polygon] [varchar](1024) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Regions] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[RegionVisitors] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:26:08 PM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors]( [VisitorId] [int] NOT NULL, [RegionId] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_RegionVisitors] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [VisitorId] ASC, [RegionId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Visitors] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:26:08 PM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Visitors]( [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Username] [nchar](64) NOT NULL, [Email] [nchar](512) NOT NULL, [PasswordHash] [varchar](2048) NOT NULL, [Bio] [varchar](1024) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Visitors] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_RegionId] FOREIGN KEY([RegionId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Regions] ([Id]) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_RegionId] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_VisitorId] FOREIGN KEY([VisitorId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Visitors] ([Id]) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_VisitorId] GO";
private const string CreateDatabaseQuery = @"USE [master] GO
/****** Object: Database [EventTestDb] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:49:32 PM ******/ CREATE DATABASE [EventTestDb] CONTAINMENT = NONE ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'EventTestDb', FILENAME = N'C:\Users\Justus\Desktop\EventTestDb.mdf' , SIZE = 3072KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 1024KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'EventTestDb_log', FILENAME = N'C:\Users\Justus\Desktop\EventTestDb_log.ldf' , SIZE = 1024KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 10%) GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL = 120 GO
IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [EventTestDb].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET ARITHABORT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET AUTO_CLOSE OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET DISABLE_BROKER GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET RECOVERY SIMPLE GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET MULTI_USER GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET DB_CHAINING OFF GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET FILESTREAM( NON_TRANSACTED_ACCESS = OFF ) GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET TARGET_RECOVERY_TIME = 0 SECONDS GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET DELAYED_DURABILITY = DISABLED GO
ALTER DATABASE [EventTestDb] SET READ_WRITE GO

data.name: CreateTables
data.value:
USE [EventTestDb] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Regions] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:26:08 PM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Regions]( [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Value] [int] NULL, [Name] [nchar](11) NOT NULL, [TimeStamp] [datetime] NOT NULL, [Description] [nchar](1024) NULL, [Polygon] [varchar](1024) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Regions] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[RegionVisitors] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:26:08 PM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors]( [VisitorId] [int] NOT NULL, [RegionId] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_RegionVisitors] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [VisitorId] ASC, [RegionId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Visitors] Script Date: 04-Aug-17 6:26:08 PM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Visitors]( [Id] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Username] [nchar](64) NOT NULL, [Email] [nchar](512) NOT NULL, [PasswordHash] [varchar](2048) NOT NULL, [Bio] [varchar](1024) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Visitors] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_RegionId] FOREIGN KEY([RegionId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Regions] ([Id]) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_RegionId] GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_VisitorId] FOREIGN KEY([VisitorId]) REFERENCES [dbo].[Visitors] ([Id]) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE GO ALTER TABLE [dbo].[RegionVisitors] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_VisitorId] GO
data.comment: Creates the tables for the database

data.name: SeedTestDatabase
data.value:
USE [EventTestDb] GO SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Visitors] ON
INSERT [dbo].[Visitors] ([Id], [Username], [Email], [PasswordHash], [Bio]) VALUES (2, N'jochen', N'jochen@email.com', N'SECURE HASH', N'I am an awesome guy.') INSERT [dbo].[Visitors] ([Id], [Username], [Email], [PasswordHash], [Bio]) VALUES (3, N'hans', N'hans@email.com', N'SECURE HASH', N'I am an even better guy.') INSERT [dbo].[Visitors] ([Id], [Username], [Email], [PasswordHash], [Bio]) VALUES (4, N'peter', N'peter@email.com', N'SECURE HASH', NULL) SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Visitors] OFF SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Regions] ON
INSERT [dbo].[Regions] ([Id], [Value], [Name], [TimeStamp], [Description], [Polygon]) VALUES (2, 1, N'Region One ', CAST(N'2010-01-20T10:23:55.000' AS DateTime), N'A brief description of this region.', N'polygon data') INSERT [dbo].[Regions] ([Id], [Value], [Name], [TimeStamp], [Description], [Polygon]) VALUES (3, 10, N'Region Two ', CAST(N'2010-01-01T00:00:00.000' AS DateTime), NULL, N'polygon data') INSERT [dbo].[Regions] ([Id], [Value], [Name], [TimeStamp], [Description], [Polygon]) VALUES (7, 5, N'RegionThree', CAST(N'2017-12-12T10:10:00.000' AS DateTime), N'This is another description for this awesome region.', N'polygon data') SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Regions] OFF INSERT [dbo].[RegionVisitors] ([VisitorId], [RegionId]) VALUES (2, 2) INSERT [dbo].[RegionVisitors] ([VisitorId], [RegionId]) VALUES (2, 3) INSERT [dbo].[RegionVisitors] ([VisitorId], [RegionId]) VALUES (4, 3)
